The segment aired on: CBS Evening News" on September 15, 2020, featuring a report by CBS News correspondent Ed O’Keefe about Joe Biden's campaign trip to Florida and his efforts to court Latino voters.
During the segment: an image of a Latinos for Trump event in Phoenix was displayed on screen while O’Keefe spoke in a voiceover about President Donald Trump's standing with Latino voters.
The full segment: including audio, clearly showed that the photo of Trump supporters at the Latinos for Trump event in Phoenix was not being passed off as a crowd from a Biden event.
The false claim accusing CBS of stealing: with the Gateway Pundit, a conservative news and opinion website, further spreading the misinformation.
